Uses of Class
com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    com.sendev.databasemanager  
    com.sendev.databasemanager.connections  
    com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts  

    • Uses of Database in com.sendev.databasemanager

      Methods in com.sendev.databasemanager that return Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Database Connection.getConnection()
      Gets the database connection instance.
      Database ConnectionContainer.getConnection(java.lang.String connection)
      Gets the database connection associated with the given name, if there isn't any database connection with the given name, NULL will be returned instead.
      Database ConnectionContainer.getDefaultConnection()
      Returns the default database connection, if there are not default connection the database with the highest database connection level will be returned instead.
      Methods in com.sendev.databasemanager with parameters of type Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ConnectionContainer.addConnection(java.lang.String name, ConnectionLevel level, Database connection)
      Adds a database connection to the connections container, allowing queries to be run against the connection.
      boolean DatabaseManager.addConnection(java.lang.String name, ConnectionLevel level, Database database)
      Adds a database connection to the connections container, allowing queries to be run against the connection.
      Constructors in com.sendev.databasemanager with parameters of type Database 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection(DatabaseManager dbm, ConnectionLevel level, Database connection)
      Creates a database connection for the DBM connection container, allowing the container to sort and managed the connection from it's connection level.
